Hi Jill,
Its a coincidence  i've started the evp  mostly out of curiously a=
nd recent exposure to other world lifeforms, books, haunted things etc.,. M=
ore to all this, i'veaccidentlally chose a astrologically signficant day (w=
hen the dragons head - rahu is=A0connected to moon by association or aspect=
) which is good enough for paranormal (especially spirits)  experiments.
Th=
e very first message i was able to deciphered  was perhaps in english"xxxxx=
xxx"  "what do you want ?". This was recorded around 00:20-00:30 am in a cl=
osed roomwith a sound of the wall clock. In the whole recording  i was able=
 to hear the wall clock=A0sound and during the voice the wall clock sound h=
ave disappeared and then resumed again
you can check the file from the link=
 below which has a the voice portion alone



"http://www.mediafire.com/fil=
e/hznzwmhzmik/gan check evp1.wav"orhttp://www.mediafire.com/?hznzwmhzmik
Th=
anks,Gan.
 -- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "mrscaptainjack2" <jjkamp@...> wr=
ote:
>
> Welcome, Gan!  Your story sounds so very interesting, I would love=
 to hear more about the stuff you're getting.  If you can post the files (n=
ot sure how you go about that, as I haven't done so myself yet), I would lo=
ve to hear them; I would also like to hear a description of your experience=
s so far (in case I can't open your files, which happens to me sometimes) -=
- are the messages seemingly from people you've known, or have names been p=
rovided by the entities you're speaking to?  What sort of things are they s=
aying?
> 
> It's my understanding that, usually, the entities speak only in=
 a language that you can understand, supposedly because YOU are an active p=
articipant in creating the messages (albiet unconsciously).  If you speak E=
nglish, you can get messages in English.
> 
> If you have the time, I'd lov=
e to hear anything you'd be interested in sharing with us.
> 
> Jill
> 
> 
=
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, zen trance <zen_in_trance@> wrote:
> >=

> > Hello Folks,
> > I'm from chennai, india and have been experimenting e=
vp for past couple of days actively.To my surprise, i can kind of make out =
the voices in english as well as my native language tamil. I am looking for=
ward to explore, share and learn more from the experienced folksin the grou=
p.=A0
> > For now, i'm using audacity in mac for recording (at 00 hrs as i'=
ve felt the timingperfectly good for silence and concentration). For proces=
sing i use soundtrack pro withwavearts noise + hum au effects to clean, boo=
st, polish the track.
> > I'm looking forward for your knowledge and ideas.=
=A0
> > P.S: Is it ok to send the mp3 to the group for analysis ?
> > Thank=
s,Gan.
> >
>
